interpretation: The "right arrow curving down" card represents a change in direction, a descent, or a redirection. It can indicate a need to move in a new direction or to change course. This card reminds us that sometimes we need to take a step back in order to move forward. It may also suggest a period of transition or a time of letting go of the old to make way for the new. This card can be a warning to avoid stubbornly sticking to a path that is no longer serving us. Instead, we should be open to new opportunities and be willing to take risks. The "right arrow curving down" card encourages us to be flexible and adaptable, to embrace change, and to trust in the journey. It reminds us that every ending is a new beginning, and every descent is an opportunity for growth.
